name: Turn tree lights on at sunset
Water herbs & lavender at 1pm if it is hot
Log Automation
data: { "name": "Automation Started", "message": "Water herbs & lavender at 3pm when it is hot" }

name: Notify
data: {"message":"It's hot today, so I am giving the herbs some extra water"}

name: Notify
data: {"message":"Someone has arrived home, so I will disarm the alarm."}

name: Disarm when someone arrives home
info:
When someone arrives home
If the alarm is armed
- Disarm the alarm
- Notify

name: Arm when nobody is home
info:
When no one is home
Wait 10 minutes
If
- No one is home and
- Alarm is not armed and
- Not during exclusion period and
- Manual override is not on

Then

- Arm alarm
- Notify

name: Should Arm?
func:
if (msg.payload['group.family'] == 'not_home' && 
        msg.payload['alarm_control_panel.alarm_panel'] == 'disarmed' &&
        msg.payload['input_boolean.alarm_auto_arm'] == 'on' &&
        flow.get('enabled')) {
    return [msg, null]
}
return [null, msg]
